entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
